title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees
description: Learn how to effectively use Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
This course is designed specifically for remote tech employees who are new to using Microsoft Teams.
goal: Help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: Understand the purpose and benefits of using Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Profile
sections.description: Learn how to customize your profile for better communication.
